title: You’ll Be Shocked to Hear About the Left’s New Agenda (Ep 1438)
description:
In this episode, I discuss the totalitarian Democrat’s push for book burning, a secret police force, and “re-education” facilities for Trump supporters. Sadly, this is not a joke. 

News Picks:


A thorough list of the Democrat’s calling the 2016 election “illegitimate.”


Project Veritas drops the hammer on Twitter again. 


Katie Couric says Trump supporters need to be “deprogrammed.”

Joe Biden plans to cancel the Keystone pipeline, and thousands of energy jobs with it.


Andy Ngo’s book jumps to number one after communist liberals try to boycott it.


Senator Josh Hawley gets a new book deal and gives the middle finger to cancel culture.


Copyright Bongino Inc All Rights Reserved.
